settings.custom_liquid: College Makeup Kit

settings.title: A Student looking for your college kit?
settings.text: Please check the order form sent to you by your college. It will include a link along with password to access your product page. If you have any difficulties accessing it please contact us for assistance.

settings.title: A Tutor in a search of a perfect College Makeup Kit?
settings.text:
Here at Nanshy, we make it super easy to build and buy your bespoke kit. We will work to your specific requirement until you are 100% satisfied. No matter your budget, we have the right products for your makeup course including beauty, fashion, media, photo, body painting, special effects, plus more.

Please fill in the form below. We will contact you back with options.

settings.title: A College looking to repurchase their kit?
settings.text: Please get in touch with your account manager or send us an email via the form below.

custom_css: .accordion {background-color: #eee; color: #444; cursor: pointer; padding: 18px; width: 100%; text-align: left; border: none; outline: none; transition: 0.4s;}
.panel {padding: 0 18px; background-color: white; display: none; overflow: hidden;}

settings.text:
Great Quality

We use Taklon bristles (most advanced synthetic fibres), sustainably sources wooden handle that is covered in 7 layers of waterproof paint. Our ferrules are made out of chrome-plated brass. It's much more robust that the aluminium used by our competitors.

Approved by Professionals

Our products are used (and loved) by Makeup Artists around the World. We have sold thousands of products with 90% of customers returning for more.
From Celebrity to Bridal, you cannot resist to have Nanshy in your kit.

Environment Friendly

Since day one, we wanted to make sure that we make a difference. Established in 2012 our aim was to be No.1 Professional Vegan brush supplier. We have been recognised by PETA.org and are proud to be 100% Cruelty-Free. It has become very popular to use no-animal brushes from very early start in students journey.

Not what you're looking for?

Please visit our shop to view our collection of products or contact us with any question.

View the shop

Contact us

settings.caption: Advanced practitioner
settings.heading: Melissa Peacock - Bedford College
settings.text:
"I would wholeheartedly recommend Nanshy to other colleges and professionals, and have been a college customer for four years now. They are very happy to put together a bespoke kit and I have always found them to have an excellent attitude to customer service, and a good understanding of my needs as a busy lecturer.

The on-line ordering is very smooth for the students/their parents to access and complete and delivery is always timely.

The brushes themselves are of the highest quality and being vegan meet the needs of all types of learners. There is a large but manageable range of brush size and shapes to meet every makeup need, and the brushes themselves are very durable. They are well balanced and clean up beautifully."

settings.caption: Technician Demonstrator ‑Make Up for Media and Performance
settings.heading: Sophie Monro - Arts University Bournemouth
settings.text:
“We first saw Nanshy brushes at IMATS and thought the synthetic brush fibres were excellent quality, soft, and could easily be kept hygienically clean.  We also liked the range of brushes in terms of sizes and shapes of the bristles, and the length of the handles.

“...the students have been really pleased with Nanshy brushes and found them to be good quality and well-made.

We would definitely recommend Nanshy to other colleges and universities.  Nanshy are professional and helpful, the brushes are great quality and excellent value for money.  We have really appreciated being able to create a bespoke kit selection, choosing a variety of styles and sizes that suits our students, and duplicates of our favourites.  I would highly recommend Nanshy and we will continue to buy Nanshy brushes because the quality and value can’t be matched.”

settings.caption: Lecturer in Media Make Up
settings.heading: Ellie Baskerville - New College Swindon
settings.text:
“Professional product, good results, excellent value. The fact the products are also totally cruelty free is a bonus with current issues. I like the range of shapes and sizes in the Nanshy brush kit, the set we select at the college (masterful collection) has a good range of shapes and sizes - appropriate for creating beauty, theatrical and fantasy makeup my personal favourite is the pencil makeup brush.

I would recommend Nanshy to other colleges as a professional starter kit for students, great value, great quality and great performance. Brushes are nice to use, clean up beautifully and have a professional finish. The service is very speedy and professional in relation to contact and delivery of goods. “
